column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////It was a casual afternoon on a weekday and so the wait was nonexistent. We were seated right away. Our group had ordered the cha cha cha ramen
column3: JINYA tonkotsu black ramen and the takoyaki. I was a bit disappointed with the takoyaki. First of all
column4: it's hard to mess up takoyaki at the restaurant - I am assuming that most places use the pre-made ones from the bag and so the flavor is pretty consistent across restaurants. The takoyaki ball itself was good. I find aesthetically unpleasing to see the takoyaki ball sitting in a pool of Japanese mayonnaise. The mayo had clotted up and it was kinda just ughh.. 6 takoyaki balls costed $10....
